mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,ORDERNUM,ORDERDATE,ORDERPRICE,ORDERSTATUS,USERID,DLVYNUM,REQUESTNUM,ORDERQUANTITY,GOODSNUM,GOODSPRICE from (select * from orders NATURAL join deliverylist natural join requests natural join goods where goodsnum in (select goodsnum from goods where CONSID=#{memberid}) order by ORDERNUM desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum,REVIEWNUM,REVIEWDATE,REVIEWCN,REVIEWSCORE,USERID,GOODSNUM,REVIEWTITLE ,CATEGORYNUM ,GOODSNAME ,PRICE ,INVENTORY ,FREEDLVY ,THUMBNAIL ,COMMENTS ,DESCRIPTION ,MAXIMUM ,CONSID ,GOODSDATE from (select * from GOODSREVIEW natural join goods where goodsnum in (select goodsnum from goods where CONSID=#{memberid}) order by REVIEWNUM desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum,INQUIRYNUM,INQUIRYCN,INQUIRYTYPE,INQUIRYTITLE,SECRETAT,INQUIRYDATE,ANSWERSTTUS,USERID,GOODSNUM from (select * from GOODSINQUIRY natural join goods where goodsnum in (select goodsnum from goods where CONSID=#{memberid}) order by INQUIRYNUM desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
